title: Miniature, "amphora", probably 4th–3rd century BC
description: part. Pointed ovoid body, entirely covered with lustrous black varnish, and encircled with an incised fret band bordered above and below by conventionalized floral ornament. B: trumpet-shaped mouth.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miniature, "amphora", probably 4th–3rd century BC.
probably 4th–3rd century BC. terra-cotta. Gift of Charles W. Gould. 1915-11-33-a,b.
